features: Really Natural. Really Works. – The First Ecocert Certified Natural Deodorant in the US, Schmidt's Charcoal and Magnesium helps neutralize odor and keeps you fresh with 24 hour odor protection
Certified 100 percent Natural Origin Fragrance – Charcoal and Magnesium Deo features a crisp scent reminiscent of freshly fallen rain, made with essential oils
Proven Protection – Whether you're looking for natural deodorant for women or mens deodorant, our award-winning natural deodorants have over 13,000 5-Star reviews. We have a scent for everyone
Fights Body Odor – 1-2 swipes is all you need for all-day protection with just a small amount. Hold deodorant stick momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat

Plant-Based Ingredients – Schmidt's deodorant without aluminum is formulated to be gentle on skin, using certified 100 percent natural origin ingredients such as odor fighting magnesium and essential oils
body.description: Really Natural. Really Works. Schmidt's Charcoal & Magnesium is the first Ecocert Certified Natural Deodorant in the US - Formulated with certified 100% natural origin ingredients, this natural deodorant for women and men is made without aluminum, and is certified vegan by Vegan Action and Leaping Bunny certified cruelty-free. Our natural deodorant formula helps neutralize odor and keep you fresh, enriched with magnesium, and offers all-day 24 hour odor protection while being gentle on skin. Schmidt's is made with plant-based oils and butters like coconut oil, jojoba seed oil, and shea moisture butter, as well as vitamin E. Luxurious, long-lasting scents made with 100% natural origin fragrance are never synthetic, always made with plant isolates and essential oils like tea tree oil, jasmine oil, and lavender oil. All of our Schmidt's natural deodorant sticks require only a small amount of application for great results. To use, hold the product momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat. Gently apply a small amount to dry, clean underarms to keep you feeling fresh all day. 1-2 swipes for application are all you need. The non-greasy and non-sticky feel allows the deodorant to be easily absorbed.

Our Signature Formula Help neutralize odor and keep you fresh, naturally. Enriched with natural magnesium24 hour protectionInnovative ingredients derived from plants and mineralsAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like bergamot, lavender, and roseHold to skin for a few seconds before swiping a little goes a long way. Enriched with natural magnesium24 hour protectionFree of baking sodaAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like jasmine, coconut, and tea treeHold to skin for a few seconds before swiping a little goes a long way. Our Hemp Formula An elevated take on our Sensitive Skin formula packed with hemp seed oil. Omega and vitamin richFree of baking sodaContains no CBD and no THC24 hour protectionAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like patchouli, sage, and rose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good but has drawbacks
reviews.reviewText: This is my go to deodorant. It's natural, it keeps me fresh, and it smells great. I have noticed over the last 2 years that it seems to be burning my skin when I am very sweaty. That being said, it's still the best one out there imo. Certain scents don't mesh with my body chemistry like lemongrass etc, this one just works perfectly. I would recommend this brand and scent specifically to anyone looking to try a natural deodorant. You will sweat, that's what bodies are supposed to do, but you won't stink. It also never stains my clothing which is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No aluminum products in this deodorant.
reviews.reviewText: Here’s what I learned along the road; the kinds of deodorant that works effectively for me, usually have some sort of aluminum chemical in them not sooner or later caused me to develop a rash. So I set out to find a good “natural deodorant.” Over a couple years I’ve tried many. Most of them were a disappointment after a while they either didn’t work well enough and / or they had an basic odor to them that I don’t care for. I was very pleased to find this product. It works. It doesn’t have an annoying odor. My advice to you is to give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective, natural, and gentle on shaved skin
reviews.reviewText: Having skin allergies, I was glad to find this natural deodorant. The charcoal is highly effective against odor, but is gentle enough to apply to shaved skin. My husband's brand ran out on a trip, so he used my deodorant. He liked it! Our out-of-state daughter ran out of her brand while visiting us, tried mine, and immediately placed an order on Amazon. (She also likes a couple of the other scents because they are not overwhelming. Then, her 12-year old son got that stinky adolescent aroma and his mom told him to try Schmidt's after showering. Another fan! It sure makes it easy to buy deodorant when others use the same type. The travel size is a perfect, practical, if not unusual, stocking stuffer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Schmidt's Charcoal for over 5 years. It's Aluminum Free & not an antiperspirant. Above all, it works exceptionally well. The Charcoal prevents any odor REALLY well. Again, it's not an antiperspirant, but those types of products are NOT HEALTHY. That said, I never seem to sweat a ton with this on.... and again the ODOR protective is the BEST I've ever experienced with such a product. It goes only fairly easy, and there is a slight residue (be careful putting on a shirt afterward). It's all natural and VERY high quality. Now for the negatives: 1) At $9 to $12, it's VERY expensive 2) at 2.65 oz, each convenient stick doesn't last that long. Of course, many brands have, in the last 3 years, skyrocketed in price... so?? BOTTOM LINE: If you want REAL 24 hour protection against ODOR in an all-natural products that have a very pleasant sweet charcoal scent (really nice scent - NOT overpowering), this is GREAT product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective but hard to wash off
reviews.reviewText: Strong fresh scent, lasts all day, but creates a very thick clay-like film which is also hard to wash off with regular body wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than other "natural" deodorants on the market that don't work
reviews.reviewText: This is my top choice for natural deodorants. The smell isn't too over bearing and it applies nicely. There is no clammy feeling and it lasts all day. I've noticed with this product that it helps control your secretion of odor even if you didn't apply it today. I've applied this product in the morning, came home after a 8 hour shift, showered, went to the gym, came home, and still no odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only thing that works for me
reviews.reviewText: I have spent my entire life trying to find a deodorant that works. They usually only work on me for a few days and then stop. My grandmother also had the same strange problem. This deodorant is the only one that has ever worked long term for me. I’m guessing it’s the charcoal, I had never tried that before. The smell isn’t the best but that fades pretty quickly and then no smell at all!! I’m a customer for life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best deodorant ever.
reviews.reviewText: Have been avoiding all aluminum in deodorant for close to 20 years. Have tried so many! Most are useless, don't do a thing. This stuff is champion. It completely works. Fragrance is fresh, citrusy, I'd say more feminine than masculine. Once applied I don't actually smell it. It is powerful, it works, and easily into the next day if needed. I couldn't find it as easily in the stores lately :( so I tried a few others including my husband's A&H unscented which works fine; I find that this one is more effective.
